description: Try our easy to follow Feta, Herb & Pine Nut Triangles recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Feta, Herb & Pine Nut Triangles Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 200Â°C. Line 2 baking trays with bake paper. Crumble the feta into a bowl and add egg and herbs. Mash together with a fork. Stir in pine nuts and season with pepper.

Filo pastry dries quickly if left uncovered, so work with two sheets at a time. Remove sheets from the packet and reseal the remainder. Cover with a damp cloth. Lay 1 sheet on the bench and brush with butter. Top with a second sheet and brush with butter. Cut lengthways into 3 strips.

Put a tsp of filling in one corner of each pastry strip. Fold over on an angle to make a triangle then continue to fold until you get to the end. Press end to seal and transfer to the baking tray. Repeat with remaining pastry and filling.
Brush top of each triangle with butter and bake for 15 minutes or until golden. Serve hot as a snack or as an entree.
